structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases
Mortgages, Conditional Sales And Pledges Of Personal Property, And Liens Thereon

law.catch_line: Actions For Failure To Disclose Real Property Was Insulated With Urea Formaldehyde Foam Prohibited
law.text: No cause of action shall arise or be maintained against a seller, lessor, real estate broker or salesperson, lender or mortgagee of real property by statute or at common law, for failure to disclose to a buyer or tenant that the real property has been insulated with urea formaldehyde foam insulation.
